00001 #ifndef __PRIM_H__
00002 #define __PRIM_H__
00003 
00004 #include "object.h"
00005 
00006 class Plane:public Object
00007 {
00008 public:
00009         Plane(Scalar _xScale, Scalar _yScale);
00010         ~Plane();
00011         void draw(GLuint textureUnit);
00012         void rescale(float _xScale=1, float _yScale=1);
00013 protected:
00014         GLfloat verts[6*3];
00015         GLfloat norms[6*3];
00016         GLfloat uvs[6*2];
00017         GLuint* BufferName;
00018         float xScale, yScale;
00019         
00020         enum
00021         {
00022                 POSITION_OBJECT=0, //marker for the position VBO
00023                 UV_OBJECT=1,//marker for the UV VBO
00024                 NORMAL_OBJECT=2,//marker for the normal VBO
00025                 COLOR_OBJECT=3,//marker for the color VBO
00026                 TANGENT_OBJECT=4//marker for the tangents VBO
00027         }markers;
00028 };
00029 
00030 Plane::Plane(Scalar _xScale=1, Scalar _yScale=1)
00031 {
00032         xScale = _xScale;
00033         yScale = _yScale;
00034         //init the verts
00035         verts[0]=0.5;verts[1]=0.5;verts[2]=0.0;
00036         verts[3]=-0.5;verts[4]=0.5;verts[5]=0.0;
00037         verts[6]=-0.5;verts[7]=-0.5;verts[8]=0.0;
00038         verts[9]=0.5;verts[10]=0.5;verts[11]=0.0;
00039         verts[12]=-0.5;verts[13]=-0.5;verts[14]=0.0;
00040         verts[15]=0.5;verts[16]=-0.5;verts[17]=0.0;
00041 
00042         //init the norms
00043         norms[0]=0.0;norms[1]=0.0;norms[2]=1.0;
00044         norms[3]=0.0;norms[4]=0.0;norms[5]=1.0;
00045         norms[6]=0.0;norms[7]=0.0;norms[8]=1.0;
00046         norms[9]=0.0;norms[10]=0.0;norms[11]=1.0;
00047         norms[12]=0.0;norms[13]=0.0;norms[14]=1.0;
00048         norms[15]=0.0;norms[16]=0.0;norms[17]=1.0;
00049 
00050         //init uvs
00051         uvs[0]=1.0;uvs[1]=1.0;
00052         uvs[2]=0.0;uvs[3]=1.0;
00053         uvs[4]=-0.0;uvs[5]=0.0;
00054         uvs[6]=1.0;uvs[7]=1.0;
00055         uvs[8]=-0.0;uvs[9]=0.0;
00056         uvs[10]=1.0;uvs[11]=-0.0;
00057         
00058         int VertCount = 6;
00059         
00060         
00061         BufferName = new GLuint[3];//setup the buffer names or handles  
00062         int PositionSize = VertCount //number of verts
00063                                   *3 //times the number of coords per vert
00064                                   *sizeof(GLfloat);//times the size per float
00065         //PositionData = new GLfloat[VertCount*3];
00066         
00067         //PositionData = myM->getVerts();
00068                 
00069         int UVSize = VertCount //number of verts
00070                                   *2 //times the number of coords per vert
00071                                   *sizeof(GLfloat);//times the size per float
00072                                   
00073         int NormalSize = VertCount //number of verts
00074                                   *3 //times the number of coords per vert
00075                                   *sizeof(GLfloat);//times the size per float
00076         
00077         glGenBuffers(3,BufferName);//generate "3" buffers using the buffername/handle array "BufferName"
00078         
00079         //above here is just init. the variables, now we setup the buffers
00080         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[UV_OBJECT]);//bind this buffer to the color buffername or handle
00081         //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, ColorSize, ColorData, GL_STREAM_DRAW);//load the color data to the buffer//for animated models
00082         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, UVSize, &uvs, GL_STATIC_DRAW);//load the color data to the buffer//for static models
00083         
00084         //above here is just init. the variables, now we setup the buffers
00085         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[NORMAL_OBJECT]);//bind this buffer to the color buffername or handle
00086         //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, ColorSize, ColorData, GL_STREAM_DRAW);//load the color data to the buffer//for animated models
00087         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, NormalSize, &norms, GL_STATIC_DRAW);//load the color data to the buffer//for static models
00088         
00089         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[POSITION_OBJECT]);//bind this buffer to the position buffername or handle      
00090         //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, PositionSize, PositionData, GL_STREAM_DRAW);//load the position data into the buffer//for animated models
00091         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, PositionSize, &verts, GL_STATIC_DRAW);//load the position data into the buffer//for static models 
00092 }               
00093 
00094 Plane::~Plane()
00095 {
00096         glDeleteBuffers(3, BufferName);
00097         delete [] BufferName;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void Plane::draw(GLuint textureUnit = 0)
00101 {
00102         glScalef(xScale,yScale,1.0f);
00103         try
00104         {
00105         glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00106         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00107         glClientActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00108         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[UV_OBJECT]);//bind to the UV buffer...
00109         glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);//and read it 
00110         
00111         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[NORMAL_OBJECT]);//bind to the Normal buffer...
00112         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);//and read it
00113         
00114         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[POSITION_OBJECT]);//bind to the pos. buffer...
00115         glVertexPointer(3,GL_FLOAT, 0,0);//and read it
00116         
00117         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00118         glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00119         glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00120         
00121         //glScalef(xScale, yScale, 1);
00122         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, 6);
00123         
00124         glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00125         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00126         glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00127         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00128         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00129         glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00130         }
00131         catch(...)
00132         {std::cout<<"error in prim plane draw!"<<std::endl;}
00133 }

00879 
00880         int VertCount = 240;
00881 
00882         BufferName = new GLuint[3];
00883 
00884         int PositionSize = VertCount*3*sizeof(GLfloat);
00885         int UVSize = VertCount*2*sizeof(GLfloat);
00886 
00887         int NormalSize = VertCount*3*sizeof(GLfloat);
00888 
00889         glGenBuffers(3,BufferName);
00890 
00891         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[0]);
00892         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, UVSize, uvs, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00893 
00894         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[1]);
00895         glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, NormalSize, norms, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00896 
00897         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[2]);
00898 glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, PositionSize, verts, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00899 }
00900 Sphere::~Sphere()
00901 {
00902         glDeleteBuffers(3, BufferName);
00903         delete [] verts;
00904         delete [] norms;
00905         delete [] uvs;
00906         delete [] BufferName;
00907 }

00909 
00910 void Sphere::draw(GLuint textureUnit = 0)
00911 {
00912         try
00913         {
00914         glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00915         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00916         glClientActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00917         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[0]);
00918         glTexCoordPointer(2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
00919 
00920         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[1]);
00921         glNormalPointer(GL_FLOAT, 0, 0);
00922 
00923         glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, BufferName[2]);
00924         glVertexPointer(3,GL_FLOAT, 0,0);
00925 
00926         glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00927         glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00928         glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00929 
00930         //glScalef(xScale, yScale, 1);
00931         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, 6);
00932 
00933         glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY);
00934         glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
00935         glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+textureUnit);
00936         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00937         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
00938         glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
00939         }
00940         catch(...)
00941         {std::cout<<"error in prim sphere draw!"<<std::endl;}
00942 }
